ctu.nengoros.comm.rosutils.utilNode.time.impl

Class DefaultTimeMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ros.node.AbstractNodeMain
      • ctu.nengoros.comm.rosutils.utilNode.time.impl.DefaultTimeMaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RosTimeUtil, org.ros.node.NodeListener, org.ros.node.NodeMain

    public class DefaultTimeMaster
extends org.ros.node.AbstractNodeMain
implements RosTimeUtil
    Periodically publishes simulation time across the ROS network to be used by other ROS nodes. This time is taken from the Nengo stimulation step. This node should be launched with the command line parameter: /use_sim_time:=false

        Publish actual time (endTime) across the ROS network.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        startTime - startTime of the Nengo simulation step

      • simulationStopped

        public void simulationStopped()
        If new script is launched, the TimeMaster does not have to be restarted. But we need to publish periodically zero again..
